alert.note: Alert for Beaver; Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 9:50PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Beaver, eastern Texas, northeastern Hansford, northern Roberts and Ochiltree Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 950 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Hooker to near Farnsworth to 22 miles north of Codman. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Perryton, Hooker, Tyrone, Hardesty, Wolf Creek Park, Bryans Corner, Baker, Adams, Farnsworth, Boyd, Waka and Turpin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
